metadata.title: CVE-2024-28827 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect permissions on the Checkmk Windows Agent's data directory inCheckmk < 2.3.0p8, < 2.2.0p29, < 2.1.0p45, and <= 2.0.0p39 (EOL) allows alocal attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
